name: Busta Wolf
description:
How we print:

About the Shirt. He is typically a cheerful and friendly fellow to everyone around him. He seems to bear no ill will towards anyone other than Geese, the killer of his adoptive father. He and his younger brother Andy were orphans adopted by Jeff Bogard, who was killed by Geese when they were children. Wishing to take revenge, he trained alone in the streets until he developed a unique fighting style which combines boxing, karate, kung fu, kickboxing and street fighting moves. Description: Become your alter-ego and show off to your friends how good you are and how good you look doing it. Shirts are printed on the infamous Gildan brand. It's not too tight and is not too baggy. Don't worry about snug fit, get the size that you know will fit you, without the second guessing. Shirt Info: *6.1-ounce, 100% cotton (preshrunk) *Seamless double-needle collar *Double-needle sleeves and hem *Taped neck and shoulders Printing Info: *Shirts are printed with Plastisol ink. *Will not crack or peel after the first wash! *Long lasting prints *Back of the shirt will have a small logo at the bottom neck area. *Shirts Individually bagged! Shipping info:

name: Predictabo!

name: Ouroboros
description:
How we print:

About the Shirt. Hiryu is an elite-class member of a group of futuristic, high-tech ninja-like agents known as the "Striders" who specialize in various kinds of wetworks such as espionage, sabotage, and assassinations. His signature weapon is his "Cypher", a plasma-generating blade with a tonfa-like handle, and he also has three "Options" support robots that he can call in for assistance. Description: Become your alter-ego and show off to your friends how good you are and how good you look doing it. Shirts are printed on the infamous Gildan brand. Awell-built Briton of African descent, sporting a pair of green dinner suit trousers, with matching green suspenders and cummerbund, as well as a white dress shirt, green bow tie, and elegant black dress shoes. Shirt Info: *6.1-ounce, 100% cotton (preshrunk) *Seamless double-needle collar *Double-needle sleeves and hem *Taped neck and shoulders Printing Info: *Shirts are printed with Plastisol ink. *Will not crack or peel after the first wash! *Long lasting prints *Back of the shirt will have a small logo at the bottom neck area. *Shirts Individually bagged!
